price: Ɔbonsam de ohia hunahuna mo, san hyε mo ma mobͻ ahohwi bra; Onyankopͻn deε Ɔde bͻne fakyε a εwͻ Nehͻ ne adom na Ɛrehyε mo bͻ. Onyankopͻn deε N’adom so paa, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱلۡفَقۡرَ وَيَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعِدُكُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَفَضۡلٗاۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-shayṭānu yaʿidukumu al-faqra wayamurukum bil-faḥshāi wal-lahu yaʿidukum maghfiratan min'hu wafaḍlan wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
